mapper.select: select id, name,cover_img,org_type, licence_code,org_nature,org_licence_img,legal_person, legal_person_idcard,legal_person_phone,contact_name,contact_mobile,org_level,org_audit_status,createtime, updatetime,adress,address_id,user_id,admission_counseling from ych_organization where legal_person like #{legalPerson}
mapper.insert: insert into ych_organization (id, name, cover_img, org_type, licence_code, org_nature, org_licence_img, legal_person, legal_person_idcard, legal_person_phone, contact_name, contact_mobile, org_level, org_audit_status, createtime, updatetime, adress, address_id, user_id, admission_counseling, is_hot ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coverImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{licenceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgNature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgLicenceImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalPersonIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalPersonPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orgAuditStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{adress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{admissionCounseling,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isHot,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) INSERT INTO ych.ych_org_introduce (detail, org_id) VALUES (#{detail}, LAST_INSERT_ID());
